channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump calls for a 10% cap on credit card interest rates
item.description: With credit card interest rates near modern highs, President Trump says he wants to cap the rates for one year.

item.title: Stocks, Bonds and the Dollar Fluctuate on Threat to Fed Chair Powell
item.description: Stocks and U.S. Treasuries were relatively unchanged on Monday, a sign investors don’t see an immediate threat to the economy.

item.title: Is Grass-Fed Beef Better?
item.description: The idea of cows grazing in a pasture seems idyllic. We asked experts how their emissions stack up compared to factory farms.
